```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(haven)
```

## 'pivot_longer'
```{r}
pulse_data = 
  haven::read_sas("./data/public_pulse_data.sas7bdat") %>%
  janitor::clean_names()
```

Wide format to long format...
make columns (bdi_score_bl~bid_score_12m into a category under "visit")
```{r}
pulse_data_tidy = 
  pulse_data %>%
  pivot_longer(
    bdi_score_bl:bdi_score_12m,
    names_to = "visit",
    values_to = "bid"
  )
```
rewrite, combine, and extend (to add a mutate)
```{r}
pulse_data = 
  haven::read_sas("./data/public_pulse_data.sas7bdat") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  pivot_longer(
    bdi_score_bl:bdi_score_12m,
    names_to = "visit",
    values_to = "bid"
  ) %>%
  relocate(id,visit)
```
